Package net.royalur.rules.dice

Class StandardDice

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.royalur.rules.Dice<Roll>
      • net.royalur.rules.dice.StandardDice
  • public class StandardDice
extends Dice<Roll>
    Follows the standard probability distribution for dice of the Royal Game of Ur, which consist of four D2 die. Dice are not thread safe.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String ID
      The identifier given to the simple rules.

      StandardDice()
      Instantiates the standard dice with a default random number generator.

      Instantiates the standard dice with random as the source of randomness to generate rolls.
